entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
